Class Portfolio

  • java.lang.Object
    • Portfolio
  • public class Portfolio
extends java.lang.Object
    A portfolio is a collection of properties. It reads properties from a file on disk, and it can be used to retrieve single properties. The file name to read from is passed in at construction.
    Version:
    1.0
